name: Fifo's Night
description:
THE GAME
Fifo's Night is a 3D puzzle-platform videogame that takes place around an enchanted mansion. A gameplay with different combat skills and a lot of jumps, makes Fifo's Night an entertaining game for all audiences.
Fifo's Night gives us the opportunity to enjoy again an oldschool 90’s style 3D platformer game, with a renewed artistic approach and all of it revolves around a spooky mood.THE STORY
The game begins when Fifo wakes up in his grave at Candywood's graveyard. But something is wrong inside. The Magical Candies that keep order among the supernatural creatures that inhabit the Mansion have disappeared. Fifo will have to make his way through the Mansion, its gardens and its dark labyrinths to meet the one who caused all of this chaos. And above all, recover the Candies and place them in their Pedestals to return everything to normal.FEATURESFantastic levels filled with detail.
Enemies and bosses full of personality.
Challenging environments.
Multiple funny puzzles.
Different collectibles.
Secret areas to discover.
